name: The Walking Dead: Issue #1
description:
This is a fan made game using the Walking Dead Comic Book.  My entire source material is from the comic book so it will be different from the TV show.  I tried to be authentic as I could to match the comic book.  

This isn't a typical RPG.  There are no items to gather or level up system.  Also, this game is short.  It could take you 30 minutes to an hour to complete.

For those who don't know, the first issue is about Officer Rick Grimes getting shot in a standoff with a criminal, goes into a coma, wakes up to the zombie apocalypse.
